matches.explanation: Missed: Red Team's 'S3 bucket storing sensitive CI/CD artifacts lacks encryption' on pipeline_artifacts was not detected
Missed: Red Team's 'Pipeline role has unrestricted access to multiple service actions' on pipeline_execution_policy was not detected

Partial match: Red Team's 'No audit logging configured for security-sensitive artifact storage' on pipeline_artifacts was partially detected as 'Missing S3 Access Logging' on aws_s3_bucket.pipeline_artifacts
Missed: Red Team's 'Role can be assumed by any AWS principal' on pipeline_execution_role was not detected
No matching finding for vulnerability: Roles can assume each other creating privilege escalation path
